name: Bridge Race 3D
description:
Collect brick of your own color, put them on any of the bridge you find near to you. make brigh for naga race. building a bridge in race of bridge balance

is always fun. stair run ridge with puzzle game crossy bridges feel all stair run and keep walk on all shortcut to be best stacky dash bridge runner.

Don't let your opponent build on your staircase. Just win the Bridge race by crossing land.

to building bridge and start race collect all building bridge. uphold all blocky for duet race escalera, make your poly bridge and create downstairs hoes.

find various shortcuts runtime. get holding various stacky dash and build bridge for race.
